bfieldtools
==================

.. title:: bfieldtools

.. container:: row limitedwidth table-like

    Open-source Python software for exploring, visualizing, and
    analyzing human neurophysiological data: MEG, EEG, sEEG, ECoG,
    and more.

.. automodule:: bfieldtools
    :members:
    
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   readme
   
   literature
   
   tutorials
   
   source/modules
